disable-controller.name: Disable Controller Support
disable-controller.description: Runs a different input loop that waits for messages instead of polling. This has greater input precision and may perform better, but will globally disable the use of controllers.

input-rate.name: Input Polling Rate
input-rate.description: Determines the amount of times per second that inputs are read, which increases precision at the cost of some performance. Extremely high values have little use unless you are using a physics bypass. Has no effect when controller support is disabled.

name: Click on Steps
description: Click between frames, but without the physics bypass.
